text:
vital-throw-message、もうちょっとどうにかしたいけど、名前のアイディアがない...
内実に合せてあるからvital以外では使えなさそうだし、みたいなもある

<https://github.com/vim-jp/vital.vim/blob/f8faa980c2b3e017984be9ae10bdcdb8f7bf8e84/autoload/vital/__vital__/System/Filepath.vim#L200-L209>
これ
<https://vim-jp.slack.com/archives/CLKR04BEF/p1601091452278900>
の事象が影響しそう

attachments.title: vim-jp/vital.vim
attachments.text: A comprehensive Vim utility functions for Vim plugins - vim-jp/vital.vim

attachments.fallback:
[September 25th, 2020 8:37 PM] milly: ```set noshellslash
for csl in ['slash', '']
  let &completeslash = csl
  echo [1, expand('~')]
  echo [2, expand('%')]
  echo [3, expand('%:p')]
  echo [4, fnamemodify('C:\foo\bar', ':p')]
endfor```
```[1, 'C:/Users/milly']
[2, 'foo\test.vim']
[3, 'C:\work\foo\test.vim']
[4, 'C:\foo\bar']
[1, 'C:\Users\milly']
[2, 'foo\test.vim']
[3, 'C:\work\foo\test.vim']
[4, 'C:\foo\bar']```
attachments.text:
```set noshellslash
for csl in ['slash', '']
  let &completeslash = csl
  echo [1, expand('~')]
  echo [2, expand('%')]
  echo [3, expand('%:p')]
  echo [4, fnamemodify('C:\foo\bar', ':p')]
endfor```
```[1, 'C:/Users/milly']
[2, 'foo\test.vim']
[3, 'C:\work\foo\test.vim']
[4, 'C:\foo\bar']
[1, 'C:\Users\milly']
[2, 'foo\test.vim']
[3, 'C:\work\foo\test.vim']
[4, 'C:\foo\bar']```
